oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of Electrolyte on the Performance of Anodic Titania Metal-Insulator-Metal Capacitors
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KARTHIK, R
KANNADASSAN, D
BAGHINI, MS
MALLICK, PS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Anodization
High-k
MIM capacitor
Titania
Frequency Dependent Capacitance
OXIDE FILMS
ALUMINA
DENSITY
TIO2
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, we report the fabrication of TiO2 metal insulator metal capacitor using various electrolytes in anodization process. The capacitors exhibit a high capacitance density of >30 fF/mu m(2). We have discussed the effect of different electrolyte solutions on the electrical and structural properties of anodized TiO2 MIM Capacitors.
